name: Poke Dash For Pokemon GO Edition
name_original: Poke Dash For Pokemon GO Edition
description:
-POKE DASH FOR POKEMON GO-

A simple infinite runner type game themed for pokemon lovers. Fun, addictive and similar to the classic Geometry Dash game, this will test your reaction and skills to build a great high score!

How To Play:

-tap the screen to make your pokeball jump over and onto obstacles. Avoid the tall grass or you will have to start over! Hold the screen to jump continuously.
-a greater highscore can grant you better pokeballs to unlock! How far can you make it? this infinite arcade game will put your skills to the test.


DISCLAIMER:

Poke Dash is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by the Pokemon brand, Niantic or Nintendo. This app is built by a fan, for fans who love the Pokemon world and wanted to create this separate game for enjoyment to fellow fans.
